    • getPendingSuggestions

      public List<String> getPendingSuggestions(String userID)
      get pending suggestions based on user Camp Role in camp.

      Staff gets a list of pending enquiries in camp

      Camp committee gets their pending enquiries in camp

      Parameters:
      userID - The unique ID of the User
      Returns:
      List of sorted pending suggestions ID by name of suggester
      See Also:
      • SuggestionListController.getPendingSuggestions(String)
